dt: {bc}freedom from legal guilt of a particular crime or offense
{bc}freedom from guilt or sin through being unacquainted with evil {bc}{sx|blamelessness||}

dt.t: … written in entire {wi}innocence{/wi} of the Italian language.

freedom from guilt or sin through being unacquainted with evil : blamelessness

dt: {bc}done without knowing that one's act would cause harm or be wrong in some way

shortdef: done without knowing that one's act would cause harm or be wrong in some way
